text: A curriculum vitae (CV or vita) is a short list of a person's education and skills used for recruitment. In North America, a short CV (1-2 pages) is usually called a résumé. In North America, people say "CV" when talking about a much longer list. In some countries, a photo of the applicant is attached to the CV. The name curriculum vitae is Latin for "course of life." ==References== Category:Documents Category:Employment
title: Curriculum vitae
